|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPi |submodelappend = yes |submodel = M1 |revision = (512MB) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H3; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.3 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646Q-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.11;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.111;FriendlyCore (UbuntuCore 20.04 LTS);
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, CVBS header, IR receiver, DVP Camera Interface, microphone, GPIO, SPI, I2C |addchip = 1A 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8008B;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, 3A 500KHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8113B;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = pi |defaultpass = pi |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = FriendlyWrt, Debian, Armbian, DietPi
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2016 |estprice = 11 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"FRIENDLYARM", "NanoPi M1" and "1603B"'' are silkscreened between the RAM chips.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A7) @1.2 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' @600MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM • [[Samsung]] K4B2G1646Q *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 3x USB 2.0 ports, 1x microUSB OTG
==Links of Interest== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/FriendlyARM_NanoPi_M1 ''FriendlyARM NanoPi M1'' on '''SunXi'''] • [[NanoPi M1]] • [[NanoPi M1 Plus]] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/03/22/nanopi-m1-allwinner-h3-development-board-with-hdmi-cvbs-ethernet-and-3-usb-ports-sells-for-11-sort-of/ ''NanoPi M1 Allwinner H3 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/quad-core-11dollar-hacker-board-runs-linux-on-allwinner-h3/ ''Quad-core $11 hacker SBC runs Linux on Allwinner H3'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:NanoPi M1 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:NanoPi M1 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
